A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is a movie for folks who want a smart\, emotional\, original Star Wars film. 

Those who are fine with Hollywood's many Transformer Pirates of the Carribean quality movies\, and who want more of the same regurgitated drivel\, are disappointed. And that's fine with me. I don't want a movie that appeals to you anyway.

I can't wait to see it again. Fantastic movie.
